match.desc_short: PHP based e-mail client
match.desc_full: AeroMail is a Web-based email client written in PHP. It uses an IMAP server to read and store messages in one or more user-defined folders, and its features include HTTP authentication for login (no cookies), folder manipulation, support for sending and viewing attachments, inline image display, multilanguage support, and URL highlighting.

match.desc_short: A simple server for streaming music and playlists.
match.desc_full: Agatha is a Web-based MP3 playing system that allows users to stream music, create and manage play lists, and control the playing of music on the remote server (as in a appliance application). Agatha is implemented with PHP and Apache.

match.desc_short: An Apache compilation toolbox.
match.desc_full: Apache Toolbox provides a means to easily compile Apache (IPv4/6) SSL, PHP(v3/v4), MySQL, Jakarta, a large number of modules (61 3rd party modules and 36 default Apache modules, static or as DSOs), and GD libraries with PNG+JPEG+Freetype2+zlib support. It is fully customizable and menu-driven. Everything is compiled from source, and wget is used to download any missing modules. It can also check for RPMs that might cause problems and create an RPM with your selections.

match.desc_short: Web-based user interface to IRC services.
match.desc_full: The Awesome Christians User Page is set of PHP scripts that allow you to access IRC services such as nickserv, memoserv, chanserv, and statserv through a Web interface. It is used by the Awesome Christians IRC network.

match.desc_short: PHP and IMAP based web mail application.
match.desc_full: BasiliX is a webmail application based on PHP and IMAP, and powered with the MySQL database server. It supports simple mail actions, sending/receiving attachments, an addressbook with group capability, settings utility, multiple languages, multiple folders and themes.

match.desc_short: A Web site content management system.
match.desc_full: basit is a Web site content management system developed using PHP. The package provides a Web- based user interface to configure all the attibutes of the Web site and add/edit/delete articles. A full usage manual including setup, administration, and maintenance is provided.

match.desc_short: A PHP Web counter on steroids.
match.desc_full: BBclone is a PHP Web counter on steroids, which displays individual logs as well as aggregated data. It is a clone of Big Brother webstats, except that it is written in PHP and it relies only on flat files (no database needed). BBclone enables any Web site administrator to have a very precise view of who visit the website: OS, browser, date, referring page etc. Main features include reload resistance, hostname resolution, proxy workaround, and blacklist.

match.desc_short: A Web forum server.
match.desc_full: BB-FORUMS is a Web forum server that creates a system permitting several forums administrated by different users. A forum can be public or moderated, and subscription-moderated. Moderated subscriptions or messages are easily accepted or rejected by the administrators of the forums into the web interface. It's written in PHP and MySQL, and can run with PHP safe mode.

match.desc_short: A PHP/MySQL Web-based multi-player strategy game.
match.desc_full: BlackNova Traders is a strategy game, loosely based on the old BBS games of Tradewars, Galactic Warzone, and Ultimate Universe, but multiplayer and Web-based. It involves space trading, conflict, and diplomacy.

match.desc_short: WWW based bookmark manager
match.desc_full: bookmarker is a WWW-based application for managing bookmarks. It allows multiple users to list, search, maintain, and create bookmarks. It is written in PHP using PHPLIB, which allows support for multiple databases. bookmarker includes functions to store URLs and send URLs via email directly from your browser (quik-mark, mail-this-link) using Javascript functions that link directly to the application. Netscape bookmark import is included as well as public/private settings to allow some/all bookmarks to be shared among users.

match.desc_short: Minimal news/weblog system
match.desc_full: bplog is a minimal news/weblog system using PHP, MySQL, and Apache.

match.desc_short: A high performance category caching system for PHP.
match.desc_full: CCat is a system for maintaing Categories in a MySQL database and caching path and child node displays. It prevents deep path calculation when displaying a path to category like "[Tolkien Books] - [Primary Works] - [The Hobbit] - [Special Editions] - [Millennium Editions]" and when displaying child nodes of the Category.

match.desc_short: A PHP class for database connection management.
match.desc_full: class.dbconn.php is a class for database connection management. It provides an easy way to store and reuse connections. This class is most useful when you don't know if you will need to connect to a database. Support for many connections is included.

match.desc_short: A PHP class to gzip encode served content before it is sent to the browser.
match.desc_full: class.gzip_encode.php is a class that will gzip content from a PHP script before it is sent to the Web browser if the browser supports gzip Content-Encoding. This can significantly decrease load time for pages over a slow connection. On some operating systems it can scale the compression level as the system load average increases.

match.desc_short: A PHP class for reading and writing MP3 ID3 tags.
match.desc_full: class.id3.php is a class for reading and writing MP3 ID3 tags and info about the MP3 stream. It was written and tested with PHP4.

match.desc_short: A currency converter that gets its info from the Web.
match.desc_full: cuco is a command-line PHP currency-converter which gets the info from oanda.com and outputs to the console by entering a value, the abbreviations of the currencies to convert, and optionally a date in the past to convert with the rate of that day. An option for listing the currency abbreviations is also included.

match.desc_short: A modular PHP-based Web portal system.
match.desc_full: DarkPortal is a project founded to create a Web portal system similar in scope to PHPNuke and PHPJ00K. It is based on the user interface style of Slashdot and other news/portal systems. It uses a modular core as a base for adding pluggable modules to facilitate content creation and management. Its primary goals are full separation of content from code, fully modular portal plugins with standardized APIs, portability and database abstraction, user level theme selection and plugin module selection, and a modular user/group hierarchy with multiple levels of moderation and admin capabilities.

match.desc_short: A feature-added PHP redirect script.
match.desc_full: DeadMan's Redirect is a portal page creation system written in PHP. It acts as a jack-of-all-trades form which allows for URL redirection as well as an interface to various search engines through its aliasing system. It also supports user-set aliases with functional arguments and a history of all the URLs that pass through DMR. The user interface is created within DMR, using regular HTML which can be as simple or as advanced as you like.

match.desc_short: PHP4-based Web shop.
match.desc_full: dev/con is a Web shop for small solutions with an easy-to-use Web interface. It features totally data-based document generation, layout and product information separated using new tags, a Web-based administration interface, ECML (not ECMA :^) ) v1.1 support, a number of products and layout templates limited only by the underlying database (MySQL). Professional support is available.

match.desc_short: A PHP-based site search capable of filesystem and database searches.
match.desc_full: DGS Search is a PHP-based site search capable of filesystem and database searches on MySQL, PgSQL, MSSQL, InterBase, and ODBC sources. DGS Search does not require a database backend.

match.desc_short: A content management/discussion engine suitable to set up a portal site.
match.desc_full: Drupal is a full-featured content management/discussion engine using Apache, PHP, and MySQL developed for drop.org. Its features include discussion forums, Web-based administration, theme support, an open submission queue, content management, a modularized design, PHP sessions, user management with access control and username/profanity/hostname filters, error logging, a public diary module, a FAQ module, an affiliate site module, backend/headline generation (RSS/RDF), localization support, and much more.

match.desc_short: Web-based reminder software
match.desc_full: E*Reminders is a series of PHP scripts that interact with a MySQL database to setup email reminders for any events or occasions you'd like. It includes recurring reminders, advance notices, and password authentication for email addresses. It can be used for an entire company, as a service for Internet users on your site, or privately.

match.desc_short: Simple but powerful PHP/MySQL forum engine.
match.desc_full: electrifiedForum is a Web forum engine using PHP/MySQL. It will support all of the major features that other forum systems offer, as well as many other new features such as realms. It is currently being used at electrifiedpenguin.com.

match.desc_short: An email reminder system.
match.desc_full: Email Reminders is a combination of two scripts - a PHP form script, and a perl cron script - that will send an email to your specified email address at a certain date and time. It uses MySQL as the database and archives the email, datetime, subject, and body of the email.

match.desc_short: An inventory control system for broadband cable TV installation contrators.
match.desc_full: eTrack is a Web-based inventory control system for broadband cable TV installation contractors. It keeps track of modems from arrival to destination, as well as all inventory used to perform installations from cable to fittings. It provides full reporting for inventory status, tracks modems and inventory by technician, and supports barcode scanning into the database. It uses PHP and MySQL.

match.desc_short: Web-based e-mail system with archive features and a day planner.
match.desc_full: FocalMail is an innovative, Web-based IMAP client written in PHP3. Its easy-to-use email interface allows you to manage your mail virtually anywhere with a JavaScript enabled Web browser. It also features a scheduler, backup emails from server, a built-in dictionary, and translation of email from different languages. It features true multi-language support, including Chinese (Big5 & GB).

match.desc_short: Free medical management software which runs in a Web browser.
match.desc_full: Freemed is medical records management (EMR) application that runs in a Web browser. It uses Apache, an SQL backend, and PHP, and is not browser specific. It aims to duplicate all of the functionality of commercial programs, while remaining free to the community.

match.desc_short: A PHP-based Youth in Residential Care package.
match.desc_full: Freemed-YiRC is a PHP package based on Freemed for use with Youth in Residential Care (YiRC) agencies. Its aim is to be a complete package to replace legacy non-free apps which aren't customizable. Since it's PHP-based, all that is needed for the client is a good Web browser with extensive table support. Some of the objectives for Freemed-YiRC are: User Management, a Contact Database, Clinical CaseNotes, an Incident Report System, an email client, a Service Plan System, a Timecard System, and Medical Billing (Medicaid/Insurance/Private).

match.desc_short: A MySQL/PHP billing DB.
match.desc_full: gcdb is an aesthetically pleasing MySQL/PHP billing database. It supports Customer, Payment, Invoice, Account, and Trouble Ticket entries. Meant for ISP, Hosting, or general billing.

match.desc_short: A PHP/MySQL-driven educational application for Web-based homework reporting.
match.desc_full: The Homework Reporting System is a PHP/MySQL project for schools. It creates an interface for teachers to enter, update, and delete homework assignments so that students and parents can then retrieve the assignments from the Web.

match.desc_short: A PHP application framework.
match.desc_full: The Horde Application framework is a set of PHP classes providing common ways to handle preferences, browser detection, authentication, help systems, MIME, connection tracking, cross-application communication, and more.

match.desc_short: A PHP news portal engine.
match.desc_full: HPE provides a configurable way of building news boxes collected from many sources into your site. It is developed in PHP and uses MySQL to store information. News items are collected from many sources around the Web in formats ranging from XML/RSS to raw HTML. Users can select news sources, arrange them on a number of pages, and even browse themes.org themes.

match.desc_short: A link checker that gets information through HTTP/1.1 and stores in a MySQL db.
match.desc_full: ht://Check is a link checker derived from ht://Dig. It can retrieve information through HTTP/1.1 and store it in a MySQL database so that after a "crawl", ht://Check can return broken links, anchors not found, content-types, and HTTP status codes summaries. A PHP interface lets the user to query and view the results directly via the web.

match.desc_short: A PHP tool for administrating multiple .htpasswd files.
match.desc_full: HTAdmin is a PHP based tool for administrating multiple .htpasswd files.

match.desc_short: A PHP class to dynamically generate and validate HTML forms.
match.desc_full: HTML Forms generation and validation is a PHP class that generates HTML forms supporting keyboard navigation, server side and client side field validation, the ability to stop the user from submiting a form more than once, sub-form validation, composition and generation of the HTML output with fields displayed as fully accessible or in read-only mode, generation of Javascript field related functions, and automatic capitalization of the text of a field.

match.desc_short: A shopping cart that uses XML/XSL.
match.desc_full: I-Store is a PHP/C++ e-business system that uses the XML/XSLT. It consists of PHP scripts for Web interface, an C++ program to manage the Internet shop, an C++ database management program, and an C++ program for processing the orders. Its main features include secure Internet payment, new product list, up to 30 shopping baskets for each registered customer, advertising for promoting products, searching for products by name, password protection for the registered customers, delivery and payment address, price in local currency and Euro, and more.

match.desc_short: A PHP-based weblog.
match.desc_full: Igloo is a new PHP-based weblog, used by such sites as http://mrpenguin.org and http://classof97.org. The scripts are simple and are easy to customize or modify. It makes heavy use of MySQL, though plans are brewing to port it to other databases.

match.desc_short: Platform for web-based training
match.desc_full: ILIAS is a platform for Web-based training. It is being developed at the University of Cologne, in Germany, using PHP and MySQL. It has been available since September 2000 as open software software under the GPL. The system's core is an authoring tool for creating courses. Other main components include personal desktops, a mail system, newsgroups, a group system, and system administration.

match.desc_short: IMAP and PHP3 based webmail system
match.desc_full: IMP allows universal, web-based access to IMAP and POP3 servers and provides an addressbook, LDAP directory searches, full support for sending and recieving attachments, and many other features normally only found in desktop mail clients. IMP is actively developed under the GPL.

match.desc_short: PHP/MySQL based project tracking with task lists.
match.desc_full: IPM is a simple project management solution. It is built in PHP4 and requires Apache 1.3.x and MySQL 3.2.x. Inside a project you can add tasks as well as estimated hours. IPM keeps track of a project specific todo list and finished list.

match.desc_short: A Dynamic PHP Photo Album.
match.desc_full: iPhotoAlbum is a dynamic online photo album program written in PHP. iPhotoAlbum that has a sleek design and has a whole slew of features included. The feature list includes support for spaces, multi-level photo folders, customized info panels, smart picture sizing, quickemail, quicklinks, and an advanced photo album navigator. It also has Picture Stats (size, width, height, type).

match.desc_short: An OO graph drawing class library for PHP.
match.desc_full: JpGraph is a OO Graph drawing library for PHP 4.0.2 and above. Highlights of the available features are: text, linear, and log scales for both the X and Y axes, anti-aliasing of lines, color-gradient fills, support for GIF, JPG, and PNG formats, support for two Y axes, spider plots (a.k.a Web plots), pie-charts, lineplots, filled line plots, impulse plots, bar plots, and error plots, support for multiple plot types in one graph, intelligent autoscaling, and extensive documentation (145 pages).

match.desc_short: kmMail is a PHP-based mail program, based on the functionality of Keftamail.
match.desc_full: kmMail is a PHP-based mail program, based on the mail functionality of Keftamail and is being developed by current Kefta employees. It is meant to be a framework for putting a web-based mail program on your site, but is still robust enough to drop into your current site with little to no modification. The goals of kmMail are MIME compliance, speed, low overhead, and an enjoyable user interface.

match.desc_short: A highly-customizable PHP & MySQL weblog.
match.desc_full: KorWeblog is a another version of phpweblog. Many features have been added, such as FAQ, download, sort comments, face icons in comments, user-selectable themes, a user-preferences page, and more.

match.desc_short: A universal Web-forum with threading support.
match.desc_full: L-Forum is universal Web forum written in PHP. It has support for threading, multiple languages, and the PostgreSQL/MySQL database server. You can also easily change its design, or even change design on-the-fly with themes support.

match.desc_short: A Web site statistics analysis program written in PHP and MySQL.
match.desc_full: Les Visiteurs is a comprehensive Web site statistics analysis program written in PHP that uses a MySQL database backend for data handling. Key reports include details on last visitors, daily breakdowns for each month, visitor OS, browsers, top referrers, top domains, hits by hour, and more. It uses the GD library for creating statistical charts. Available languages are French, English and Italian.

match.desc_short: A PHP-based bug tracking package.
match.desc_full: Mantis is a PHP/MySQL-based bugtracking system. It is designed to be easy to deploy and customize. It supports multiple projects, email notification, and is localized for English, Dutch, French, Korean, Italian, German, Norwegian, Spanish, Turkish, and Portuguese.

match.desc_short: A Web-based helpdesk system for small companies and organizations.
match.desc_full: mhd is a Web-based helpdesk system for small companies and organisations that uses PHP4 and MySQL.

match.desc_short: A PHP script for publishing photos on the web
match.desc_full: Martin's Photo Frame is a PHP4 script that automatically creates a clean Web interface (using frames) from a directory full of JPEG images. It creates thumbnails automatically and will use JPEG comments if it finds them. No database or metafiles are needed.

match.desc_short: A highly configurable and feature-laden whois lookup script.
match.desc_full: MWhois is a highly configurable and feature-laden whois lookup script written in both PHP and Perl. It features whois querying, a domain name wizard for creating domain names from information provided, and a global domain name wizard to search through all domain types. All of MWhois was created using template files to make sure that the script integrates well with your Web site.

match.desc_short: A DBMS-independent package to access and manage databases with PHP.
match.desc_full: Metabase consists of a set of PHP classes to access and manage databases using an API that assures DBMS independence. There is a function library that interfaces with DBMS specific driver classes, a parser class that interperts a custom XML format used to describe database schemas, and a manager class that installs database schema objects (tables, indexes, sequences) using the Metabase API. The manager class is also able to upgrade a previously installed database to a new schema without affecting that data that was stored since the database was installed or was upgraded for the last time.

match.desc_short: A PHP Application Server Suite - Web building with Web-based tools
match.desc_full: Midgard is a freely-available solution for managing content on Web and WAP services. It is also a toolkit for building dynamic PHP applications to power eBusiness and Information Management processes. Midgard has been built and is actively maintained by a global group of software professionals working together.

match.desc_short: Factory class for multiple databases in php
match.desc_full: Multidb is a factory class that generates objects for use in php code. It allows faster reuse without having to redo code when porting to different databases. It wrapps common function calls like db_connect -- there is no need to change code when working with different database backends.

match.desc_short: A complete and powerful blogging tool
match.desc_full: MyPHPblog is a weblog application using MySQL and PHP4 for those wanting a free and easy way to create their own 'blogs'. MyPHPblog allows for the collaboration of many users on a single blog, and creation of multiple blogs.

match.desc_short: A PHP and MySQL Web-based secure Javascript-free chat room.
match.desc_full: MWChat (MySQL Web-based Chat) is a Web-based chat system that uses PHP4 and MySQL. It has support for multiple rooms and languages, a handful of IRC-like commands, private messages and rooms, message encryption, buddy lists, logging, registered users, chat profiles, and more. It is a very lightweight, full-featured, and secure chat room.

match.desc_short: Simple record/row level locking for MySQL databases in PHP.
match.desc_full: mysql_locking.php is a very simple implementation of record/row level locking for MySQL databases using PHP. It provides several PHP functions to lock/unlock unique rows in a table.

match.desc_short: Content mangement inteface to the Midgard PHP application server extension.
match.desc_full: Nadmin is an user-friendly interface to the Open Source Midgard content management engine. Midgard provides organizations with cost-effective ways of creating and maintaining their site in a controllable distributed environment. With Nadmin, marketing departments and product teams have the tools for producing and communicating content to the corporate Web sites and the world at large. Distributed content production provides faster time-to-market for product communication.

match.desc_short: Collection of small PHP utilities.
match.desc_full: Nifty PHP Utilities is a collection of small utilities written in PHP that do an assortment of things. Currently, the collection includes a Bandwidth Monitor, a Filename Beautifier, a Host IsAlive Monitor, an Interactive PHP Monitor, and an RPM Up-To-Date checker.

match.desc_short: A more flexible PHP4-based MRTG replacement.
match.desc_full: NISCA (Network Interface Statistics Collection Agent) is a more flexible PHP4-based MRTG replacement. It supports both SNMP and reading localhost's /proc/net/dev device file directly for statistics gathering. It uses MySQL to store collected data in, and stores statistics for bytes transferred, packets transferred, transfer errors, and dropped packets separated into a per interace incoming and outgoing set. It generates both graphs and a textual report table using the data from any timeframe contained in the database. The entire package runs using PHP4; it uses the CGI binary version of PHP for stats collection (running in the background as a "daemon") and either the CGI or Apache module versions to generate the GUI form and reports. It can also import existing MRTG logfiles.

match.desc_short: A PHP4-based Webmail client
match.desc_full: NOCC is a simple and fast Web-based e-mail reader which can handle POP3, SMTP, and IMAP servers. It is written with PHP4, and uses sessions, has low requirements (no database, frames), and is easy to install. It also features multi-language support, MIME attachment decoding/encoding, and the ability to display HTML messages.

match.desc_short: Php/Perl/MySQL-based frontend to the BIND 8.2 name server.
match.desc_full: oDns is a simple php/Perl/MySQL frontend to the BIND 8.2.1 Name Server. All the hosts information is saved in four SQL tables. The php-based Web frontend allows you to add/edit/remove domains (primary and slaves) and contact information. In the background, Perl is used to generate standard named.conf and specific zone files for all the primary domains.

match.desc_short: PHP4-based qmail+vmailmgrd maildomain administration Web interface.
match.desc_full: oMail-admin is a PHP-based Web frontend to qmail and vmailmgrd. It can be used by domain owners and single users to easily administer their mail accounts without bothering the sysadmin. Its features include mailbox/alias management, auto-responder (vacation-like) support, support for changing passwords, and translations for the French, English, Swedish, Chinese, Japanese, Spanish, Italian, Russian, Danish, Romana, Czech, Nederlands, and German languages.

match.desc_short: A PHP4-based, multi-user task management system.
match.desc_full: oTasks is a multi-user tasks management system, featuring a recursive and distributed task tree, an open user management system (everybody can create an account), and email notifications. It can be used as trouble-ticket system.

match.desc_short: Web based ERP/WMS software developed in PHP.
match.desc_full: Pavin' The Way is a 100% browser-based software application for distribution companies. The application processes all supply chain (Item set-up to Accounts Payable) and sales chain (Customer set-up through Accounts Receivable) transactions. All transactions are captured in the General Ledger . The software's scope is broad enough to be applied to any distribution company.

match.desc_short: Collection of PHP-Classes to create PDFs
match.desc_full: PC4P (PDF Class for PHP) is a library of php-classes to speed up the creation of reports and letters with support for such things as tables, images, background-images, wordwrap, pagebreak, all kinds of text manipulations, and editing different pdf-pages simultaneously.

match.desc_short: A PHP-based content-management framework for building PHP sites.
match.desc_full: Pecos is a content-management framework for building and managing Web pages and applications with objects. Data objects are stored in a database for simplicity and compatibility. Pecos provides capabilities for storing and retrieving these objects, and a Web-based interface for managing them.

match.desc_short: A WWW GUI for the litestream mp3 streaming server.
match.desc_full: The Personal Internet Broadcasting Script (PIBS) is a PHP/Apache frontend to create dynamic mp3 playlists and broadcast them with litestream. It can be used to manage playlists for a LAN in an office or to manage your Internet mp3 radio station.

match.desc_short: PHP Mailing list archive viewer for Minorfish
match.desc_full: Phisherman is a web-based archive viewer for the mailing list Minorfish, written in PHP. The interface can easily be modified to match the colors of your website. Phisherman supports viewing the mailing list archives by year or by month.

match.desc_short: A Web-based email, address book, and calendar manager.
match.desc_full: Phorecast is a single-user Web-based email, address book, and calendar manager. It is written in PHP4 with MySQL as the database backend. The functions are closely integrated and share all common information. For example, the address book email addresses are available when sending mail, and clicking on the name of a sender in an email list brings up his or her contact card.

match.desc_short: A PHP code library for building database-driven forms.
match.desc_full: Phormation is a set of PHP functions which provide a framework for developing any HTML form with a database backend (currently PostgreSQL and MySQL are supported). It allows you to write and make use of reusable widgets so you can develop Web sites more quickly. Phormation includes more than 10 widgets including text field, date, file upload, and select, and is easily extensible. It has good documentation. Both PHP3 and PHP4 are supported.

match.desc_short: An eCommerce application for PHP and mySQL.
match.desc_full: phorSale is a very basic Web and database e-commerce application. It features session-based order ("shopping cart") with session variables stored in cookies and URLs, user recognition via a unique identifer stored in a cookie and URL, "Lost Password" functionality, a placed order history viewer, dynamic shipping pricing generated by product weight from UPS and Federal Express (or by the use of a customer's own UPS/FedEx shipping number), and product searching by keywords, descriptions and titles. It has customizable HTML header/footer and product categories, a password-protected administrative interface, and product management to add, edit, delete, activate, and deactivate products via an admin interface. It provides credit card number/date validation, a CyberCash "wrapper" to parse responses from a local CGI, and the ability to edit stored profile information such as addresses, password, and email prefs.

match.desc_short: Phorum is a web based discussion software written in PHP
match.desc_full: Phorum is Web-based discussion software written in PHP. Unlike some popular Web boards, Phorum utilizes a database to manage its messages. It is in use by The WB (talk.thewb.com), Slackware.com, Zend.com, and several other popular Web sites.

match.desc_short: A web-based picture organizer.
match.desc_full: Photo Collection is a Web-based picture organizer. Pictures are indexed in a relational database (currently MySQL), and can be organized in hierachical categories. Each picture has a thumbnail and can have a name. It is written in PHP on the Web side, and there is a Perl client for database administration.

match.desc_short: 3 PHP4 functions to verify credit card checksums and types.
match.desc_full: PHP Credit Card Preverifier is a PHP script that provides three functions which are necessary for prevalidating credit card numbers before sending them to a credit card machine or service for charging.

match.desc_short: PHP/MySQL photo album, designed for digital camera users.
match.desc_full: PPA/W ("P-paw") is a MySQL database that stores EXIF information (date taken, focal length, f-stop, etc) of digital photographs and presents it in a logical, attractive Web interface. Photos can be placed in up to five sections each, and each photo and section can have their own comments. Photos are added via a Perl script, and the user can manually add EXIF information to non-EXIF images. After photos are added, all administration functions (except deletion) are performed via the Web interface.

match.desc_short: Integrated Web applications.
match.desc_full: php(Reactor) is a set of Web applications which are designed to maximize user interaction. The core is a BBS/forum which supports flat, threaded, and ranked views. An articles board allows users to submit and comment on articles, and a content management system (cms) enables easy online maintenance of your pages. Other applications include e-cards, polls, and a complete admin suite. Users can create forums, create polls, and become moderators within the framework of the applications. php(Reactor) includes multilingual support and is template-based.

match.desc_short: A content management system that provides dynamic menus and templates.
match.desc_full: With PHP-Content-Management-System (phpCMS), you need only one template for your whole Web site. It allows you to provide dynamic menus with as many menulevels as you want. It lets you use templates and subtemplates without the need for a database. It is search engine-friendly and proxy-friendly, which means that both search engines and proxies won't distinguish the pages generated with phpCMS from static HTML pages. phpCMS is cross-platform, so you can use it on Windows and Unix. Caching of parsed pages and gzip compression speed up your server. The Web site for this program is in German, but the documentation is in English.

match.desc_short: PHP language bindings for the GTK+ toolkit.
match.desc_full: PHP-GTK is a PHP extension that implements language bindings for GTK+. It provides an object-oriented interface to GTK+ classes and functions and greatly simplifies writing client side cross-platform GUI applications.

match.desc_short: PHP Toolbox is a database-powered websites RAD.
match.desc_full: PHP Toolbox is designed to make the process of creating database-powered websites easier. It utilizes the iterative or step-by-step development paradigm. E.g. PHP Toolbox enables you to create full-functional administrative web-interface for arbitrary set of db tables within minutes. Any changes you'll make in these tables after the test driving will be handled by PHP Toolbox automatically. Then you can even adjust this automatic interface to your specific needs in iterative manner.

match.desc_short: A Web guestbook written in PHP3 with a MySQL backend.
match.desc_full: php3guest is a Web guestbook written in PHP using a MySQL backend. Entries can easily be edited or removed by the owner via a Web interface. Installation and configuration is easy and well documented. php3guest features modular language support with German, English, Chinese, Spanish, Hungarian, Italian, and Danish sample modules provided. The code is fully documented and is a fine starting point to learn PHP.

match.desc_short: Application scoped variable manager.
match.desc_full: phpApplication is an application level variable manager. It allows you to have a set of variables that are scoped to the entire PHP site, not just the session or page. The variables set will be available from any page that uses the same application object name. phpApplication gives PHP a similar option to ColdFusion's #Application.var# storage and ASP's Application object.

match.desc_short: A feature-rich PHP discussion board.
match.desc_full: phpBB is a UBB-style dissussion board written in PHP backended by a MySQL database. It includes features such as posting/replying/editing messages, private messages, private forums, user and anonymous posting, robust theming, user ranking by posts or by special, admin definable, ranks, and much more.

match.desc_short: A PHP based messaging system.
match.desc_full: phpBoard is ultimately aimed at becoming a messaging board system comparable to others such as Ultimate Bulletin Board (UBB) or ezBoard. It is a work in progress that is rapidly evolving to achieve this goal and is primed for a stable release very soon.

match.desc_short: A Bug Tracker written in PHP.
match.desc_full: phpBugTracker is an attempt to copy the functionality of Bugzilla while providing a codebase that is independent of the database and presentation layers.

match.desc_short: A small HTTP spider/indexing search engine using PHP and MySQL.
match.desc_full: PhpDig is a search engine written in PHP that uses a MySQL database backend. It features indexing of both static and dynamic pages, spidering of almost all links in HTML content, in hrefs, areamaps, and frames, and full text indexing.

match.desc_short: A PHP script for creating javaDoc-style documentation from PHP code.
match.desc_full: PHPDocumentor is a PHP script for creating javaDoc-style documentation from PHP code. It can currently document classes and understands many of the @paramaters in the documentation.

match.desc_short: PHP class library to create and extend XML/XHTML-based documents.
match.desc_full: phpDOM is a PHP class library for creating and extending XML/XHTML-based documents. It can be easily extended to reflect several documents. It includes two packages: phpDOM for pure XML, and phpDOM.XHTML for well-formed XHTML documents. These two packages can be used as examples of how to extend the base classes. The library depends on the DOM/XML functions provided by PHP 4.0.x. However, these functions are not yet completed, and phpDOM therefore has some restrictions.

match.desc_short: A PHP/MySQL script to keep track of your DVD collection.
match.desc_full: phpDVD is a PHP script that allows you to keep track of your DVD collection. The information is stored in a MySQL database and an interface is provided to add, edit, and delete entries. Customizable fields allow you to display the details of importance to you; the default fields are: Title, Studio, Year, Original Aspect Ratio, and Audio Format. You can optionally link each title to its corresponding page at the Internet Movie Database.

match.desc_short: A web based filesystem implementation.
match.desc_full: PHPFileExchange provides a web based file interchange system similar to that provided by www.xdrive.com and www.freedrive.com. It features authenticated user login, user groups, read and write access control at the user and group level, user privilege levels, assorted logging options and a MySQL database backend. Files are associated with folders. Access to files and folders can be controlled at the group and user level.

match.desc_short: A Web-based software suite.
match.desc_full: phpGroupWare (formerly known as webdistro) is a multi-user groupware suite written in PHP. Its provides a Web-based calendar, todo-list, addressbook, email, news headlines, and a file manager. The calendar supports repeating events. The email system supports inline graphics and file attachments. The system as a whole supports user preferences, themes, user permissions, multi-language support, an advanced API, and user groups.

match.desc_short: Product management add-on module for phpGroupWare.
match.desc_full: phpGW inventory is an add-on application for phpGroupWare to provide product management.

match.desc_short: An add-on application for phpgroupware.
match.desc_full: phpgw projects is an add-on application for phpgroupware to provide project management. phpgw projects divide into hours accounting, invoicing and statistics.

match.desc_short: A free PHP search engine simulation script.
match.desc_full: phpLinks is a free PHP script which allows you to run a very powerful link farm or search engine simulation. Features include full search capabilities, recursive multilevel site categorization, full referrer tracking, site reviews, site ratings, link validation, related categories, category searching, and search term tracking.

match.desc_short: A little text-file-based PHP chat.
match.desc_full: phpLittleChat is a fast text-file-based chat application with multichannel support and a userlist of the selected channel. It currently works with Netscape and Internet Explorer. It was written with PHP 4 (4.0.0 or greater required). root access is not required to install phpLittleChat.

match.desc_short: Dynamic plots, charts, and graphs in PHP.
match.desc_full: PHPLOT is a PHP graphics class for creating charts and plots in native PHP. It supports both PHP3/4, TTF and non-TTF fonts, data in text-data, data-data, data-data-error formats, GD versions 1.2 and greater, and the image formats GIF, WBMP, PNG, and JPEG. Movable axes can be scaled as text, linear, and/or log scales. PHPLOT also supports importing images as a background, PHP sessions, multiple graphs on one image, and saving images to disk for incorporating into PDF documents. Plot types include pie, bar, line, linepoints, area, scatter, error-bar, and thinbarline.

match.desc_short: Complete chat system based on PHP and MySQL
match.desc_full: phpMyChat is an easy-to-install, easy-to-use multi-room chat based on PHP and a database, supporting MySQL, PostgreSQL, and ODBC. It supports some IRC-like commands, and has been translated to 33 different languages.

match.desc_short: Count and comment your Web pages using PHP and MySQL.
match.desc_full: phpMyCoCo allows you to count your visitors and comment your pages with the help of PHP and MySQL. It features a counter (including basic statistics since 0.0.2, including configurable reload-protection since 0.9.9) and a system which allows users of a Webpage to add comments to them (threaded since 0.0.4). Starting with 0.9.9 administration of comments is included as well.

match.desc_short: Mail newsletters to all members of a group.
match.desc_full: phpNewsletter is an easy app to drop into your current site that enables users to subscribe and unsubscribe to a newsletter. It allows admins to list all users, setup newsletters, and send newsletters. It is able to handle multiple languages but needs some translations.

match.desc_short: PHP Web site news utilities.
match.desc_full: phpNewsStand is a set of PHP utilities allowing for easy creation, display, and editing of news stories for a Web site.

match.desc_short: Simple PHP Web based POP e-mail reader
match.desc_full: phpop is a very simple Web-based POP e-mail reader. It lets you read, reply, forward, and delete messages from your POP server, as well as send new messages. It's written in PHP and utilizes the PHPLIB class library and the POP3 class.

match.desc_short: A PHP implementation of POP3.
match.desc_full: phPOP3 is a PHP layer for POP3. Through its API you can easily access POP3 email servers and read, delete, etc. email messages.

match.desc_short: Generates forms like OOH-Forms from PHPlib, but simpler.
match.desc_full: phpOpenFormGen uses simple definitions to create a form out of PHP code. It is similar to OOH-Forms, a tool that comes with PHPlib. You can store multiple form definitions in one file and simply use the function to display it on screen. It includes server-side error-handling, multiple language support, string-length checking, and more.

match.desc_short: A PHP tool to help track users through your site and measure its usability.
match.desc_full: phpOpenTracker is a site- and visitor-tracker that stores the collected data in an SQL database. An API for analysis, chart and report generation (via DocBook/XML and XSLT) with HTML and PDF output is included. phpOpenTracker provides clickpath analysis and usability measuring.

match.desc_short: A PHP-based Oracle 8 administration frontend.
match.desc_full: phpOracleAdmin is a Web-based Oracle Object Manager similar to Objectmanager and phpMyAdmin, but it offers more possibilities.

match.desc_short: A POP webmail client written in PHP.
match.desc_full: PHPost is an Open Source Web-based POP e-mail client written in PHP4. It is designed to work with any standard POP server (not IMAP). Its features include a simple and clean interface, full MIME support (including sending/decoding both base64 and uuencoded attachments), multiple languages, a wide variety of message sorting options, per user preferences, doesn't use cookies, and requires no third party libraries or modules.

match.desc_short: A PHP-based PostgreSQL administration utility.
match.desc_full: Based on phpMyAdmin, phpPgAdmin is a fully functional port for PostgreSQL. It has all the basic functionality you need to completely administer a PosgreSQL server and/or database, including the ability to administer views, sequences, stored procedures, and triggers. Features include the ability to create and drop databases; create, copy, drop, and alter tables/views/sequences/functions/triggers; edit and add fields (to the extent Postgres allows); execute any SQL-statement, even batch-queries; manage keys on fields; create and read dumps of database and tables; and administer one single database, multiple servers, and Postgres users/groups.

match.desc_short: An HTTP proxy written in PHP.
match.desc_full: PHPProxy is an HTTP proxy written in PHP. It allows you to convert your PHP hosting provider's Web servers into your personal proxy servers.

match.desc_short: qmail/ldap administration
match.desc_full: phpQLAdmin was designed to administrate a qmail/LDAP server over an easy-to-use Web interface. Currently, it supports: add/remove domains; add/remove/edit users; change attributes for all domain members; set password, quoata, mailhost, mailaddresses, alias addresses, forwarders, and more; configurable application language (currently supports English and German, planned support for French, Italian, and Swedish).

match.desc_short: A reviewing Web application written in PHP.
match.desc_full: phpReview is a complete, free reviewing system, entirely based on PHP. Originally made for book-reviews for the NL.Linux.org site, it will be redesigned to be a general reviewing system, including voting, reactions, and anything else found in a good reviewing system.

match.desc_short: An open source groupware suite.
match.desc_full: PHProjekt is a groupware suite which supports communication and management of teams and companies via an Intranet and the Internet. It consists of multiple components including a group calendar with resource booking, a time card system, project management, a request tracker, a mutual filesystem, a contact manager, a forum, chat, notes, shared bookmarks, todo lists, a voting system, reminders, and WAP- and PDA-access. Language files are available for 17 languages and the installation is a quick and easy procedure.

match.desc_short: Schedule creation and maintenance for shift based departments
match.desc_full: phpSched is an application for the creation and management of shift-based schedules. Current features include template creation, managing multiple departments, multiple shift types (regular shift, Supervisor shift, etc.), email notification, asking for or offering shifts, schedule publishing, and validation.

match.desc_short: A search engine front-end script for inclusion into a PHP webpage.
match.desc_full: When included into a PHP page, this script will show you a simple customizable search engine front-end to your favorite search engines.

match.desc_short: PHP3 & PHP4 multi-language login and password client authentication.
match.desc_full: phpSecurePages is a PHP module to secure pages with a login name and password. It can handle multiple user groups (each with their own viewing rights), store data in a MySQL database or a configuration file, and be used to identify your Web site viewers. It also has multiple language support as well as session support for both PHP3 and PHP4.

match.desc_short: A simple and powerful PHP E-Commerce solution for B2C and B2B.
match.desc_full: phpShop is a PHP electronic commerce solution. It requires PHP version 3 or 4 and a mySQL database. It offers the capability of running B2C or B2B sites. Site administrators can easily manage all aspects of store administration via a web browser. phpShop's unique architecture allows developers to easily extend its functionality through the use of plug-in modules. phpShop is more than a shopping cart application. phpShop is also an application development platform.

match.desc_short: slash rewritten in PHP.
match.desc_full: phpSlash is a port of the slash-0.2 code from Perl to PHP. Since it was first started, phpslash has become a different beast of its own. It currently boasts full HTML templates, an OO design, the ability to operate in a hosted environment, and a bunch of other goodies.

match.desc_short: A PHP SMaSh client for sending SMSes via the Web.
match.desc_full: phpSmash is a PHP class implementing the SMASH Protocal as used by SMaSh, a GPL'ed SMS server supporting more than 19 operators.

match.desc_short: A script that displays system information (kernel, uptime, partitions, etc.).
match.desc_full: phpSystem is a PHP script designed to give the user information about their system in an easy-to-read format from any Internet-connected computer, such as kernel, uptime, memory and swap, and partition space.

match.desc_short: A Web-based timsheet with an SQL backend.
match.desc_full: PHPTimeSheet is a Web-based system to keep track of workers' times on various jobs. The time information is stored in a MySQL database. Hours worked are linked to a specific worker, job, and company, and the system is administered through a password-protected Web interface. Simple reports of the hours may be generated by worker, job and company.

match.desc_short: A framework for creating a Web-hosting site.
match.desc_full: PHPWebHosting is a framework for allowing users to store files and Web pages on a Web server with nothing more than a Web-based interface to the server. It is similar in function to the free Web-hosting that Geocities offers. Its features include unlimited directories, renaming of files, MIME-types, file sizes, sorting by different criteria, and more. It has advanced group support, with many public and private authentication options. A Web-based administration interface is included.

match.desc_short: A complete Web-log/news-site framework written in PHP.
match.desc_full: phpWebLog is a Web-based news management system written in PHP. It uses a MySQL database. All the content, including multiple design layouts, themes, and languages can be edited/deleted through a user-friendly administration mode. It supports the importing and exporting of headlines from other sites via Netscape's RSS/RDF format. It also supports story moderation, an expandable links manager, threaded comments, and it allows site owners to expand their site by creating static pages from the administration page.

match.desc_short: PHP based web page annotation system.
match.desc_full: phpWebNotes is a PHP/MySQL-based Web annotation system. It allows users to add comments to existing Web pages and documents, thus increasing the usefulness of a site. Comments are reviewed before becoming visible.

match.desc_short: Script to show predefined userprofiles.
match.desc_full: phpwebplan shows predefined userprofiles. Written in PHP4 and optimized for "local" or alternative use on a webserver. Some features are an Administration Interface, user controlled activation/deactivation of their profiles (local version only), and template structure support for the the "user searchbox" and the "user profile".

match.desc_short: Build dynamic webpages from HTML and PHP code snippets.
match.desc_full: PHPWidgets! is a tool for building dynamic webpages out of HTML and PHP code snippets. It provides a means of building pages using reusable elements. It can be set up to allow users to customise their accounts.

match.desc_short: XPath parser for PHP.
match.desc_full: phpXML is a class for accessing XML documents through the powerful XPath language without requiring the DOM XML extensions to be setup on your server. This script makes XPath available everywhere, even on sites that do not have this extension available.

match.desc_short: A web front end to a running XMMS/Icecast server.
match.desc_full: phpxmms is a web front end to a running XMMS/Icecast server. It allows users to skip, pause, play and add songs remotely. It also supports 'skins' and will work from any computer with an internet connection.

match.desc_short: A utility for cross-referencing PHP scripts and extracting inline documentation.
match.desc_full: PHPXref is a small Perl script that cross-references functions, variables, and SQL tables used in a PHP-based Web site and generates HTML output. In addition, it can extract inline formatted comments from the PHP files to provide browsable documentation for the functions defined in the scripts.

match.desc_short: Imlib2 extensions for PHP4.
match.desc_full: php_imlib is an extension for PHP4 that makes the Imlib2 image manipulation library available from within PHP scripts. The extension will build as a self-contained shared object, or as a module built into PHP.

match.desc_short: A PHP resource filemaneger with upload in the DB.
match.desc_full: PMF (PHP and MySql File manager) is a little PHP filemaneger that stores all its information in a MySQL database. It has its own upload capabilities, and it recognizes the MIME-type of the content. PMF can even be used as an image-database storage applet, giving you the ability to link directly to a resource in the database.

match.desc_short: A POP3-email WWW-interface.
match.desc_full: POP3-Checker is a POP3 email interface for the Web, written in PHP. It contacts the POP3 server via network sockets.

match.desc_short: A Web-based POP3 PHP mail-client.
match.desc_full: Popper is a Web based mail client that allows you to access your personal mailboxes on POP3 servers.

match.desc_short: A PostgreSQL session save handler for PHP4.
match.desc_full: PostgreSQL Session Handler for PHP is a custom session save handler for PHP4 that uses PostgreSQL as the session cache. This allows multiple Web servers to share a common session storage container and is useful for allowing Web users to move between machines while maintaining their session state.

match.desc_short: A JSP-like template engine for PHP.
match.desc_full: PSPCooker is a template engine for PHP that mimics Sun's JSP functionality. External template files (static HTML files) are compiled into PHP files when requested. Then, and on subsequent requests, the generated PHP files are executed. PSPCooker is able to detect when an HTML source file has been modified, and will recompile the associated PHP file automatically.

match.desc_short: A highly customizable Website managing tool with PHP.
match.desc_full: PTL (Path and Textbased Layoutengine) is a Web site managing PHP4 script which provides a strict seperation of information and layout, a Web interface for information updates, and a modulelike enhancement feature (for features like caching, authorization, and autolink). PTL stores your information in textfiles, and different layouts can be chosen by the visitor of your website.

match.desc_short: A PHP script for distributed.net raw stats retrieval.
match.desc_full: Rawhide is a PHP class which retrieves member stats from the distributed.net web server and prepares them for presentation on other web pages. It grabs the stats in a "raw" format instead of the normal stats pages; this substantially lightens the load on distributed.net's web server and speeds the presentation time on your own web server. Rawhide will support all distributed.net contests including RC5-64, OGR, and others.

match.desc_short: An affordable, enterprise-class business database built on PHP and MySQL.
match.desc_full: Using PHP and MySQL, rimric interactive offers a complete intranet database for any sized business. It allows you to maintain invoices, purchase orders, contacts, customers, suppliers, employees, projects, documents, products, and assets all from a single interface. Users can select color schemes and interact with data using the fastest technologies available.

match.desc_short: Open Source Web Application Toolkit for PHP.
match.desc_full: SiteManager is an Open Source Web Application Toolkit for PHP Developers that includes a framework for code modules and layout templates, database connectivity, SmartForms, sessions, and some other tools. All parts of the system are integrated through object-oriented libraries which allow for easy expandability and maintenance.

match.desc_short: A small but reliable Webmail gateway.
match.desc_full: rymo (Read Your Mail Online) is written in PHP. It features a lightweight interface and needs a POP3 server for reading and an SMTP server for sending mail.

match.desc_short: PHP spell checker interface to "ispell."
match.desc_full: A down and dirty PHP function to filter a string through the UNIX spell checking utility "ispell." It take a string as a parameter and returns a string with possible misspellings highlighted. Very small and simple.

match.desc_short: A set of PHP classes to facilitate the creation and maintanence of a Portal.
match.desc_full: SiG is a set of PHP Classes to facilitate the creation and maintenance of an Information Portal.

match.desc_short: A document repository system.
match.desc_full: SDMS uses PHP to provide you with a pretty interface to a MySQL server that allows you to store and retrieve documents and to share those documents between users. In addition, the system uses ACLs (Access Control Lists) to grant access rights to documents on a per-user basis.

match.desc_short: A simple system to implement an online posting and discussion system.
match.desc_full: SimpleSQL allows anyone with some PHP experience and common sense to implement an online posting and discussion system. It requires Web design knowledge; PHP/MySQL experience will allow you to get the most out of it, but it is fairly simple to work with.

match.desc_short: A PHP3 Slashdot headline grabber.
match.desc_full: slashdot-php is a PHP-based Slashdot headline grabber. It uses the new XML backend (as the old one has been depreciated), and enables "light mode," which is useful for sending to a Palm Pilot.

match.desc_short: The PHP compiling template engine.
match.desc_full: Smarty is a template engine for PHP. Many other template engines for PHP provide basic variable substitution and dynamic block functionality. Smarty takes a step further to be a "smart" template engine, adding features such as configuration files, template functions, and variable modifiers, and making all of this functionality as easy as possible to use for both programmers and template designers. Smarty also converts the templates into PHP scripts, eliminating the need to parse the templates on every invocation. This makes Smarty extremely scalable and managable for large application needs.

match.desc_short: Snoopy is a PHP class that implements web client functionality.
match.desc_full: Snoopy is a PHP class that simulates a web browser. It can automate the task of retrieving web page content and posting forms, for example, and has many configurable parameters.

match.desc_short: A persistent database connection system.
match.desc_full: SQL Relay is a persistent database connection system supporting ODBC, Oracle, MySQL, mSQL, PostgreSQL, Sybase, MS SQL Server, DB2, Interbase, Lago and SQLite with C, C++, Perl, Python, Zope and PHP APIs, command line clients and a GUI configuration tool. It is ideal for speeding up database-driven web-based applications, accessing databases from unsupported platforms, migrating between databases, distributing access to replicated databases and throttling database access.

match.desc_short: A PHP4 Web-based email reader.
match.desc_full: SquirrelMail is a standards-based webmail package written in PHP4. It includes built-in pure PHP support for the IMAP and SMTP protocols, and all pages render in pure HTML 4.0 (with no Javascript) for maximum compatibility across browsers. It has very few requirements and is very easy to configure and install. SquirrelMail has a all the functionality you would want from an email client, including strong MIME support, address books, and folder manipulation.

match.desc_short: A PHP/MySQL system to allow schools to track student progress with teacher comme
match.desc_full: The Student Anecdotal System is a PHP/MySQL project for schools. It creates an interface for teachers to report on the progress of students. The information is then emailed to the student's advisor/homeroom teacher as well as kept in an online database so other teachers can view progress. The interface was designed so that teachers who are not particularly adept with computers can still use this program easily.

match.desc_short: Streaming web-based chat.
match.desc_full: Stutter is a simple, Web-based chatroom application, written in PHP, that does not use Java or any type of plugin. It continuously streams the chat data, rather than refreshing the chat frame every so often.

match.desc_short: Customizable voting booth written in PHP using a MySQL backend.
match.desc_full: Sympoll is a highly-customizable PHP script used to create and display Web-based voting booths. Individual polls can easily be embedded into any Web page, and you can also link to a pre-formatted list of all available polls. Any number of polls may concurrently exist. Creation, modification, and deletion of polls is made extremely easy through a web-based adminstration page.

match.desc_short: A PHP/MySQL news backend.
match.desc_full: Thatware is a Slash lookalike. It is a Web-based news publishing and discussion backend written in PHP that can handle threaded discussions with a minimum of configuration and day-to-day management. It includes Web-based administration, polls, access statistics, user customizable boxes, a themes manager for registered users, the ability to edit or delete stories, a moderation system, search engine, backend/headlines generation (WAP and RSS/RDF format), and support for 7 languages.

match.desc_short: A slick Web-based photo album written using PHP.
match.desc_full: Gallery is a slick Web-based photo album written using PHP. It is easy to install, includes a config wizard, and provides users with the ability to create and maintain their own albums in the album collection via an intuitive Web interface. Photo management includes automatic thumbnail creation, image resizing, rotation, ordering, captioning and more. Albums can have read, write, and caption permissions per individual authenticated user for an additional level of privacy.

match.desc_short: Group memory archive.
match.desc_full: TimeCapsule is a PHP/MySQL application to archive memories or moments submitted by users and moderated by administrators. Anonymous users can be allowed to comment on moments and a random moment is desplayed from the TimeCapsule database with each visit to the site. TimeCapsule has a search and allows for user profiles.

match.desc_short: PHP application to keep track of hours worked on a project.
match.desc_full: Timesheet.php is a comprehensive multi-user online project tracking program. Users can keep track of hours worked on various projects and particular tasks. There is full support for client tracking and billing. Timesheet.php requires PHP3 or PHP4 and MySQL. It has only been tested under Apache.

match.desc_short: A music info generator using Perl and PHP.
match.desc_full: Trackslave is a client/server style application with a PHP backend that allows you to display the currently playing track from XMMS on your Web page easily and with lots of information. It uses HTTP to post the information, and also supports HTTP proxies.

match.desc_short: Network traffic monitor.
match.desc_full: TrafDisp is a network traffic measurement package. It allows you to monitor the amount of incoming/outgoing KBps on a selected network interface(s) from at least one machine. It allows a network administrator to monitor the traffic that is generated by all the hosts on the network. The traffic is viewable in neat graphs that are generated by a PHP-enabled Web-server. The logs are stored in a MySQL table.

match.desc_short: A web-based IMAP client written with PHP3
match.desc_full: TWIG is a web-based IMAP client written with PHP3. Its features include IMAP E-mail, contact management, scheduling, Usenet newsgroups, todo manager, and bookmark management. Any piece of information can be shared with other users on the system using TWIG's built-in groupware functionality. TWIG is written and implemented completely with the PHP programming language. The author's intention is that it becomes a simple, cross-platform, fast, and browser-independent way to access or share almost any kind of information, without the complexity or costs of other intranet/groupware packages.

match.desc_short: A Web-based Napster client written entirely in PHP.
match.desc_full: WebNap is a PHP Napster client that allows you to download songs from a Napster/Opennap/MyNapster or compatible server using a Web browser.

match.desc_short: A template class for PHP which allows you to separate your code from HTML.
match.desc_full: XTemplate is a template engine for PHP which allows you to store your HTML code apart from your PHP code. It has many useful features such as nested blocks and various kinds of variable interpolation, and yet the code is very short and very optimized. It includes several examples and was written with an attempt at being easy to understand. The basic syntax is from FastTemplate and QuickTemplate but the entire class was written from scratch without code from other template engines.

match.desc_short: An easy to use online photo gallery made in PHP4.
match.desc_full: YAPPA (Yet Another PHP Photo Album) is an easy-to-use online photo gallery. It creates any needed thumbnails for the user on the fly, and adding pictures to your existing gallery is as easy as FTPing to the album directory.

match.desc_short: PHP-powered Bulletin Board system
match.desc_full: Yet Another PHP Bulletin Board (YapBB) allows you to set up a forum on your Web site, using PHP4+MySQL. The goal of this project is to create a good, full featured, and free bulletin board. Features include multible boards, modular programming, different user authentication levels with appropriate privileges, a certain level of protection to prevent HTML abuse and abuse of other exploits, many client-side options, and more features to come.

match.desc_short: general purpose web forum application
match.desc_full: Zorum is an easy to install Web-based forum, message board, or bulletin board. It requires Linux, the Apache webserver, a MySQL database, and the PHP4 script module. Some of its main features include both threaded and linear views, personalization, moderated forums, and styled skins.
